Documentation

main :: IO () Source #

main is the starting method for the hangman game

type WordList = [String] Source #

type Wordlist is Syntactic sugar for a list of Strings

allWords :: IO WordList Source #

Reads words from 'dict.txt' into a list dict.txt originates from MacOS's default dictionary

minWordLength :: Int Source #

The minimum length of a word

maxWordLength :: Int Source #

The maximum length of a word

gameWords :: IO WordList Source #

Returns a list of words, based on criteria matching minWordLength, maxWordLength

randomWord :: WordList -> IO String Source #

Randomly chooses a word from a list

randomWord' :: IO String Source #

Chooses a random word from gameWord

data Puzzle Source #

Datatype for Puzzle, contents in order are The word to find, the list of discovered letters, and the list of letters attempted

Constructors

Puzzle String [Maybe Char] [Char] 
Instances

defines how the Puzzle datatype is displayed

Methods

showsPrec :: Int -> Puzzle -> ShowS Source #

show :: Puzzle -> String Source #

showList :: [Puzzle] -> ShowS Source #

freshPuzzle :: String -> Puzzle Source #

Generates a new Puzzle datatype, for a new game

charInWord :: Puzzle -> Char -> Bool Source #

Returns True if the character is in the word

alreadyGuessed :: Puzzle -> Char -> Bool Source #

Returns True if the character has already been guessed

renderPuzzleChar :: Maybe Char -> Char Source #

Renders the characters or blank spaces of the discovered word, Nothing is displayed as '_'

fillInCharacter :: Puzzle -> Char -> Puzzle Source #

Places the guessed character into the guess list, and updates the discovered letters if it is in the word

handleGuess :: Puzzle -> Char -> IO Puzzle Source #

Handles the character based on if it was previously chosen or is a character in the word, and prints the appropriate message

gameOver :: Puzzle -> IO () Source #

Checks if it is game over, based on number of incorrect guesses.

gameWin :: Puzzle -> IO () Source #

Prints the win message and exits, if all characters are correctly guessed

runGame :: Puzzle -> IO () Source #

Runs the main portion of the game
